work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Optimized the 3D reconstruction deep learning multi GPU cloud-based training pipeline in PyTorch Lightning, used for holographic live stream generation, reducing compute time by 40%. Adapted open source, deep learning, monocular 3D reconstruction PyTorch model to different domain dataset, with different data and cameras, and enabled multi GPU training on Azure ML.

volunteer.summary: Organized 7th and 8th CS Week, a week-long series of lectures and workshops at Mathematical Grammar School, spanning a wide range of areas in computer science. Lecturers include Forbes 30 under 30 awardee, DeepMind Staff Researcher, NVIDIA senior engineer.

projects.name: Actor-critic reinforcement learning bot
projects.summary: Devised an actor-critic reinforcement learning algorithm for solving Open AI gym MuJoCo environments with continuous action space.

projects.name: Stock price prediction

The project was done as a high school final year paper and it is displayed on the high school's website as one of the best final year papers
